descriptions: ['DescriptionBetter Homes are pleased to present this upgraded 5 bed villa in the sought after Meadows 3. The property has been lived in by the owner from date of hand over and have been well looked after and upgraded internally and externally.\xa0 Downstairs there is spacious entrance hall, a double bedroom with a en suite bathroom leading off the hall, the hall way then leads on to a good sized living area. There is a eat in kitchen which has been upgraded throughout complete with Miele appliances and a laundry room together with a maids room.Upstairs there are two bedrooms that share a bathroom and two of them which have en suite bathrooms one of them being the master bedroom which has an upgarded bathroom.Outside the gardens are well landscaped and there is a private pool together with a sun deck and a thatched roof siting area.Located North of the Lakes and the Springs, The Meadows is close to Sheikh Zayed Road, JLT and Dubai Marina, far enough away from noise and traffic and a short drive from Ibn Battuta Mall, Marina Mall and Mall of the Emirates.\xa0 This community is popular with families and couples looking to buy or rent either a townhouse or a villa; the schools located nearby also raise the area\x92s popularity - Emirates International School and nursery is located in The Meadows.Call David Stainton on +971559776047 or visit www.bhomes.com for further details']

descriptions:
["DescriptionLuxhabitat is proud to present this vacant & furnished 3-bedroom apartment for sale at Aquamarine, Tiara Residence on Dubai's iconic Palm Jumeirah.
This spacious B type 3-bedroom apartment is spread out over 2,248 sqft and genuinely boasts some of the best views that Dubai has to offer that include Burj Al Arab and Atlantis. It also enjoys direct beach access.
Key features:
* Vacant 
* No mortgage
* Stunning beach access, Atlantis and Burj al Arab views
* 2,266 Sqft BUA
* 3 double bedrooms - all en suite
* Balcony
* Fitted kitchen with Bosch oven/ hob
* Study area + storeroom
*  2 Parking space
* Swimming pool, Resturant & Kids Play Area
Viewing is highly recommended on this apartment and can only be viewed through a confirmed appointment.
Tiara, as its name suggests, is a beachfront resort community centrally located on The Palms Trunk. A dynamic residential and resort community, Tiara offers private beach access and panoramic views. It provides its residents with a desirable all-in-one way of living: luxury, convenience, privacy and peace of mind. For those who just want to escape from it all, Tiara is an ideal retreat with an impressive array of amenities and services at hand; for those who want to be among the excitement.
The Palm Jumeirah is one of the most ambitious real-estate developments on earth, named as the 8th wonder of the world as it can be seen from space as a beautiful palm-shaped land. A true resort-style development, it is described as not just a place to be, but rather an experience."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionExclusive Links Real Estate is proud to present to the market this one of a kind brand new custom built villa for sale located on J frond on the sought after Palm Jumeirah with outstanding views of the Dubai Marina Skyline, the property is an odd number which enjoys the Dubai sunrise.
This architecturally inspiring Villa sits on a plot size of 15,662 sq. ft and a large living space of 11,745 sq ft. The villa is arranged over three floors with a stunning 360 degree view of Dubai,it boasts six large bedrooms all en-suite finished with beautiful interiors, marble and wooden flooring throughout the property.
The villa has been designed with high ceilings and large window frames that fill the home with natural light and stunning views along with large modern open plan kitchen with state of the art appliances with a preparation kitchen and a full home automation system.The home has been designed with several large terraces with seating areas overlooking the Dubai skyline.
The villa is beautifully landscaped fitted with LED lights and BBQ area with a large infinity pool.
This villa is truly one of a kind and viewings are highly recommended to appreciate the location and quality of the property.
Viewings can be arranged on short notice please call Jason on +971561159041']
